templates.name: location-card
templates.description: Location card with business name, address, phone, hours, and directions link. Supports LocalBusiness schema for rich snippets.
templates.example_markdown:
@location
Downtown Office
123 Main Street, Suite 100
New York, NY 10001
(555) 123-4567
Mon-Fri 9am-5pm

templates.name: image-figure
templates.description: Responsive image with caption, credit, and ImageObject schema for SEO.

templates.name: content-block
templates.description: Generic content section with heading and body text. Flexible for various content types.

templates.name: person-card
templates.description: Person/profile card with photo, name, title, bio, and social links. Uses Person schema.
templates.example_markdown:
@person
Jane Smith
CEO & Founder
https://example.com/jane.jpg
Passionate leader with 15 years of experience...

templates.name: event-card
templates.description: Event card with name, date, location, description, and registration link. Uses Event schema for rich snippets.
templates.example_markdown:
@event
Tech Conference 2025
March 15, 2025 at 9:00 AM
San Francisco Convention Center
Join us for the biggest tech event of the year.
https://example.com/register

templates.name: review-card
templates.description: Review/testimonial card with rating stars, review text, author, and date. Uses Review schema.
templates.example_markdown:
@review
5
Absolutely amazing product! Changed my workflow completely.
John D., Verified Buyer

templates.name: how-to-steps
templates.description: Step-by-step guide with numbered steps. Uses HowTo schema for rich snippets.
templates.example_markdown:
@howto How to Get Started
Follow these simple steps to begin your journey.
1. Create an account
2. Complete your profile
3. Start using the platform

templates.name: pricing-card
templates.description: Pricing card with plan name, price, features list, and CTA button. Uses Offer schema.
templates.example_markdown:
@pricing Pro Plan
$29/month
- Unlimited projects
- Priority support
- Advanced analytics
- Custom integrations

templates.name: job-card
templates.description: Job posting card with title, company, location, salary, and apply button. Uses JobPosting schema for Google Jobs.
templates.example_markdown:
@job Senior Software Engineer
Acme Corp
San Francisco, CA (Remote)
$150k - $200k
Full-time
https://example.com/apply

templates.name: social-post
templates.description: Embedded social media post placeholder for Twitter, Instagram, LinkedIn. Uses SocialMediaPosting schema.

templates.name: breadcrumb-nav
templates.description: Breadcrumb navigation with hierarchical links. Uses BreadcrumbList schema for rich snippets.
